content: {"Name": "Catholic Charities Senior Services of Schenectady", "Entity_Id": 305, "Category": "Community Meal/Soup Kitchen", "Subcategory": "Senior Meal Services", "Organization": "Schenectady County ", "More_Information": "Reservations are required. Guests under 60 are required to pay $10.00.", "Counties": ["Schenectady"], "Location": "Scotia-Glenville Senior Center", "Address": "32 Worden Road", "City": "Glenville", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12302", "Phone": "5183828481 ext. 1", "Hours_of_Operation": "Monday- Friday 11am-1pm", "Cost": "Suggested donation $3.50 for seniors 60+ and $6.00 for guests. Food stamps accepted & no one is denied.
